ygData.subject: Re: purple and such
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is your guild not aware that you can switch anonymous off?  I was not pleased to find that invoking /roleplay also made me anonymous.  Verant blindsided me
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:41 AM 6/29/99 -0700, jay schultze wrote:
>Personally I'd love to go purple, but my guild doesn't allow it because it
>also makes you anonymous. People like me are your worst nightmare!!! Purple
>but ya never knew! muahahahaha

Is your guild not aware that you can switch anonymous off? I was not
pleased to find that invoking /roleplay also made me anonymous. Verant
blindsided me with an unexpected side effect. So when turning on /roleplay
I simply try to remember to go to Options-General and turn anonymous back off.

Bob
